title: Spacious 1 Bedroom Apartment  ~ Lagoon View
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!

Set among the shimmering Foster City lagoons, Beach Cove offers waterfront living with spacious 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans all with beautifully appointed kitchens, large private patios or balconies with stunning views, gorgeous flooring, and generous closet space.

Experience the beauty right outside of your home as well, with community features such as two sparkling pool with sundeck, large resident lounge, lighted basketball and tennis courts, sand volleyball, a multi-level cardio & strength training center with weekly fitness classes and poolside grilling areas.
Look no further for your perfect fit, contact Beach Cove today and schedule a tour so that we can help you find your new home!
Month to month None,3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months
Floor plan specifications are approximate and may vary.
Pricing and availability subject to change.
Please contact our leasing center for complete information on monthly rental rates and any additional charges that may apply.
Please contact the onsite community staff should you come across a sublet or short term stay at this location through other online sources.
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven, Stainless Steel Appliances

Elegant Resident Lounge, Social Resident Events, Fitness Studio w/ Cardio & Weights, Dry Sauna, Two Swimming Pools w/ Sundeck, Poolside Lounge & Grilling Area, Tennis & Beach Volleyball Courts, Free Tennis & Cardio Classes, Complimentary Wi-Fi in Common Areas
Easy Access to HWY 101, 280 & 92, San Mateo - Foster City School District, Community Rewards Resident Program, Spacious Walk-in Closets, Designer Wood Style Flooring, Quartz Counters
